review: I love Amazon and love the Fire TV. I'm happy they offered this smaller option. All you have to do is plug it into the HDMI connection on your TV and plug in the power cord and you're ready to watch your favorite shows. Easy to use even for non technical people.
author: M.R.

review: Remote control "impossible to open" and it took a lengthy phone call to Amazon to finally get "stick" up and running. Not for the technically challenged.
author: Steve Cohen

review: Had about a week now and I'm pretty impressed so far.  Still deciding if I like the remote or not.  Happy that it can run iHeart and YouTube.
author: Ray Anderson

review: I love my amazon fire stick. Half the time there is nothing good on tv or I want to watch something that's not on, enter the fire stick. I have prime and netflix on my account. I have found that usually when I can't find something on netflix prime has it, and if it costs on prime netflix has it. Plus it links to amazon music, which is great to have playing while you clean or read.
author: Sedia

review: I preordered mine before they were available then Amazon let Bestbuy sale them for just a few bucks more than my discounted price and I still had to wait till December to receive mine.  It is fast and very responsive the only down side is the menus are a little unorganized and they hard to read from across the room. All in all it's a great product that just needs some refinement.
author: Scott Barrett

review: Great addition to tv viewing. Fire TV Stick is a wonderful alternative to expensive satellite and cable packages that lock you in at their mercy for 2 year commitments. Countless movies and tv shows to watch and thousands of songs to add to a listening library. This also puts all of your pictures in the cloud at your fingertips for easy viewing on your tv. Only give it four stars because I feel the user interface is a bit cluttered and can be confusing for those less accustomed to today's technology. Other than that, it is a great buy and I would highly recommend it, especially if you are a prime member.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Worked fine at first, but began to experience streaming interruptions every few minutes. Switched back to Apple TV just to be sure problem wasn't with wifi. Apple TV works fine without interruption.
author: Steve S

review: Love it love the convenience and all the options and for me the best part about it is that I could ditch the slow computer... Nothing but smooth streaming hd quality awesomeness
